messages.message: Hi team, I created an app and when I go to run the app, I see that agent mode is set by default even though the app is on legacy mode. This is a bit confusing what the intended experience is supposed to be. This is the project (https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/deployments/01989a89-d853-72d8-a485-5689a60370cc/runs)

Hey @Sayan thanks for flagging this! The toggle in app runs is temporary while we are working on runtime integration but you are right that definitely makes sense for default value to align. will add that to our polish list!

It doesn't look like there's a way to easily extend what is stored on an app about its associated build project just yet. I tried writing more stuff to the publish app endpoint (`/api/v2/aihub/build/projects/app`) and it just got ignored. I'll need the backend to expand that endpoint before I can do anything here.
@pauline.comising @ayesha.ali @Serena
